seo_keywords: Dreame L10s Ultra not dispensing solution
Dreame L10s Ultra mop pads not spinning
Dreame L10s Ultra bag full error

problems.title: Not Dispensing Cleaning Solution
problems.description: The robot mops with water only, solution cartridge doesn't empty.
solution_steps: Remove the small rubber seal on the cartridge cap.
Poke a small hole in the top vent of the cartridge to improve flow.

problems.title: Mop Pads Falling Off
problems.description: The magnetic mop pads detach during operation.
solution_steps: Replace the mop pads if the velcro is weak.
Set 'No-Go Zones' over high carpet thresholds.
